name: liri-node-app
description: LIRI is like iPhone's SIRI. However, while SIRI is a Speech Interpretation and Recognition Interface, LIRI is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. LIRI will be a command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data. Getting Started • Clone down repo. • Run command 'npm install' in Terminal or GitBash • Run command 'node liri.js' or one of the commands below.
